name: Capsule (itch) (Serhii Mozhaiskyi)
description:
You are awaken after anabiosis in your capsule. However, this is not what you think ... at least for a first few minutes.

On desktop, fullscreen mode is highly recommended.

This is an English translation of my previously released game "Капсула". The game was fully reimplemented in Ink with my work-in-progress ink-based engine, Atrament.
